TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 1
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.193.cipherString: I have tried too in my time to be a philosopher; but, I don't know how, cheerfulness was always breaking in.
CIPHER.193.question: A quote from Oliver Edwards has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.215.cipherString: Baking is both an art and a science.
CIPHER.215.question: The following quote by Sherry Yard needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=11 and b=4.

CIPHER.211.cipherString: In school they told me Practice makes perfect. And then they told me Nobody's perfect, so then I stopped practicing.
CIPHER.211.question: A quote from Steven Wright has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.194.cipherString: We are so busy teaching small things about life to children that we forget to learn big things from them.
CIPHER.194.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Kavita Bhupta Ghosh which has the word FORGET in it.

CIPHER.200.cipherString: Leave stories behind that add to hopes of generations to come.
CIPHER.200.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Aquib Ali using a Baconian cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.207.cipherString: The only way to fail, is when you allow it to happen.
CIPHER.207.question: A quote by Maged Gamani has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3=–×, 8=××, 7=×●, 4=●×, 6=––, 2=–●

CIPHER.205.cipherString: War is never a lasting solution for any problem.
CIPHER.205.question: A quote by A.P.J. Abdul Kalam has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 5=–, 4=×, 1=●, 2=×, 3=–, 0=●

CIPHER.198.cipherString: Uh strate face and a sincere sounding "Huh?" have gotten meow of more trouble than eye can remember.
CIPHER.198.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller.  You are told that it contains the word SINCERE.

CIPHER.206.cipherString: It's never too late to be what you might have been.
CIPHER.206.question: A quote by George Eliot has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 4=–×, 5=×–, 6=–●, 2=●–, 1=●×

CIPHER.196.cipherString: I liked math - that was my favorite subject - and I was very interested in astronomy and in physical science.
CIPHER.196.question: A quote by Sally Ride has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K1 alphabet for you to decode. You are told that it starts with I LIKE.

CIPHER.202.cipherString: Eternity is a long time, especially towards the end.
CIPHER.202.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Stephen Hawking using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with ETERN.

CIPHER.208.cipherString: If a person is not free, his right is restricted.
CIPHER.208.question: A quote by Sunday Adelaja has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with IF A PER.

CIPHER.216.cipherString: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose.
CIPHER.216.question: A quote by Garrison Keillor has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 4 and 6 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.212.cipherString: It is a tragedy of modern life that the light of truth scares the society much more than the darkness of ignorance.
CIPHER.212.question: A quote from Abhijit Naskar has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.201.cipherString: Art can help us reclaim a sense of wonder in our lives.
CIPHER.201.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Ivan Fernandez using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.203.cipherString: Puedes pasar toda tu vida recolectando días, y ninguno compensará la que deseas tener de vuelta.
CIPHER.203.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Mitch Albom into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  You are told that letters CDU map to EAS.
CIPHER.203.translation: You can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back.

CIPHER.197.cipherString: The greatest danger for most of us is not that we aim too high and we miss it, but we aim too low and reach it.
CIPHER.197.question: A quote by Michelangelo has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet for you to decode. You are told that it starts with THEG.

CIPHER.199.cipherString: If you blame others for something that happens in your life, then you must wait until they change in order to get better.
CIPHER.199.question: A famous phrase from Wayne Dyer has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. You are told that it ends with TER.

CIPHER.209.question: After solving the cryptarithm CARGO+FLYING=AIRFOIL decode the phrase 91658 91753628.

CIPHER.204.cipherString: Knowledge will help you to solve any problem
CIPHER.204.question: A quote by Sunday Adelaja has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 6=–, 2=●, 3=×, 5=×, 7=–

CIPHER.195.cipherString: A single bad habit will mar an otherwise faultless character, as an ink drop soileth the pure white page.
CIPHER.195.question: Hosea Ballou was heard to say the following phrase which ends with: PAGE.

CIPHER.213.cipherString: Maybe some things aren't meant to be known. maybe there just meant to be accepted.
CIPHER.213.question: Solve this quote from Wendy Mass which has been encoded with the Atbash cipher.

CIPHER.210.cipherString: The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.
CIPHER.210.question: The following quote by Alexander Graham Bell needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of PHONE

CIPHER.217.cipherString: Once in a while, however, the impossible happens in life. Just hang in there.
CIPHER.217.question: A quote by Bhuwan Thapaliya has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 2 and 4 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.214.cipherString: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
CIPHER.214.question: Encode this quote by Melody Beattie using the Atbash cipher.
